description: Application under Section 96A of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended) for approval of non-material amendment to planning permission granted under reference 19/03068/FULL1 (granted for Formation of vehicular access and parking area associated with existing vicarage, widening of existing vehicular access, demolition of existing structures/outbuildings adjacent to the vicarage (excluding existing garage), relocation of existing childrens play area and erection of detached two storey 4 bedroom dwelling with associated hardstanding, bicycle and refuse store). Proposed amendments comprise: amended roof tiles; provision of Air Source Heat Pump to rear; amendment to canopy to side flank/study entrance; amendment ground levels/above ground height of property; amended internal layout and thickness of walls; formation of canopy over front door.
